title: LoL client has stopped working
body:
Hello , past weeks I played without any problemema , yesterday night I went to bed and today when I came from work I wanted to play but after I log in game with my username and pasword I recive an error that says :
 LolClient.exe has stopped working
A problem caused the program to stop working correctly

I searched everything for like 8 hours , nothing I could do anymore , tryed compatibility , tryed with DNS , reinstaled the game , checked for hard disk errors , deleted rads air , uptaded my internet explorer and did all the settings i found here for IE 11 , runed the game as administrator i did all i found, nothing works i even Hextech Repair Tool and still dosent work. Below is my logo , please help me

replies.body:
It looks like you've tried quite a number of good first steps to resolve this. I suspect this issue may be a result of your client not being able to reach the game platform servers. Since local network settings are the most common culprit for these issues, I recommend working through the steps in our [connection troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a next step.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
